Once upon a time, there was a little girl named Mia. Mia was very creative. She loved to play in her bedroom and make things with her toys. One day, she wanted to make a big tower with her blocks. But she had a struggle. The blocks kept falling down.

bird stuck in a tree. The bird was sad and needed help. Mia wanted to save the bird, but she didn't know how. Then, she looked at her shapes and got an idea.
Mia used her shapes to build a tall tower. The tower reached the tree where the bird was stuck. Mia climbed the tower and saved the bird. The bird was so happy to be free.
Mia and the bird became best friends. They played with the shapes together all day long. From that day on, Mia knew that her shapes could do more than just make her happy, they could save others too.

Mia wanted to help. She picked up the bird and put it on a branch close to the ground. The bird was happy and thanked Mia.
